title: Of liberty and servitude translated out of the French into the English tongue, and dedicated to Geo. Evelyn, Esquire.
author: La Mothe Le Vayer, François de, 1583-1672.
publisher: Printed for M. Meighen and G. Bedell ...,
notes: "Authors epistle" signed: De la Mothe le Vayer.
Translation of De la liberté et de la servitude.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
